title: Amid alarming spike in Covid cases, India-B'desh trade on

By Sujit Chakraborty
Agartala/Silchar, Apr 26 (IANS): Amid the alarming spike in the number of Covid-19 cases in both India and Bangladesh, the trade between the two neighbouring countries continues to be unaffected as exports-imports are being carried out by strictly enforcing the standard operating procedures (SOPs).....
